meaningMnemonic: You already learned that 披露 means "announcement" or "display," so add a <kanji>banquet</kanji> to that and you're at a <vocabulary>wedding reception</vocabulary>! Or if no one's getting married but they're showing off something at a big place with food and stuff it's a just a normal <vocabulary>reception</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
